Entries.spring_11.002: Do I get a new toy?
Entries.spring_11.000: We are going to the art shop today.$h

Entries.Potat_Crash: Ew I hate Sweet potatoes. #$b I hope mom won't make me eat any.. $s
Entries.Mon: I eat 6 cookies for breakfast every day.#$q 305/306 beachquestion_followup#Do you think that's weird?#$r 305 15 beachquestion_yes#Yes#$r 306 -10 beachquestion_no#No
Entries.beachquestion_followup: $p 305#It might be weird.$u|Especially with a glass of milk.$k
Entries.Mon4: $d kent#I'm glad Dad's back... but he's different than I remember...$s|Dad's not around much... I miss playing with him.$s
Entries.Tue6: Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Miss Penny when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u
Entries.Wed: I found this buoy at the harbour earlier. Look how happy it is. I'm gonna show everyone!$h
Entries.Thu: Bababooey told me you made him sad.$u#$b#You are mean.$s
Entries.Fri: You are slacking off. Go get that fish ON!$h
Entries.Sat_1: Dad's coming back soon!#$b#I hope he brings me some toys.$u
Entries.Sat: Did you see that horses are selling ice cream now?$k
Entries.Sat8: $d kent#Dad seems weird since he came back. I wonder what happened to him?$s#$b#He doesn't play with me anymore.$s|I wonder if Dad will ever come home...$s
Entries.Sun10: Hi Uncle @!^Hi Auntie @!#$e#Don't tell Mom... but you're my favorite grown-up.$h
